meaningMnemonic: Make your <radical>barracks</radical> out of <radical>thread</radical> so it will be <kanji>pure</kanji>. If you build it out of clay or bricks or wood, it will inevitably have some dirt in it. Build it out of thread to keep it pure of... well, impurities.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>pure</kanji> thread barracks can only be used in <reading>June</reading> (じゅん), unfortunately. Any other time of year there will be snow and rain and mud and that will get tracked into the pure barracks and ruin them. But June is the cleanest, most pure month, so you can use it then.
